This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Village & Pillage]] update ({{BE}} 1.11.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Texture Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.10.x releases).

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}} 
|-
| [[Illager captain]]
| {{animate|Pillager with Ominous Banner.png;Vindicator with Ominous Banner.png|84px}}
| Spawn in [[illager patrol]]s and around [[pillager outpost]]s
| Various Items
|
* Are [[pillager]]s or [[vindicator]]s that wear special illager banners on their heads.
* Gives the player a [[Bad Omen]] status effect when killed.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}} 
|-
| [[Ravager]]
| [[File:Ravager.png|128px]]
|
* Renamed from Illager Beast to ravager.
* Added bite and roar attacks.
* Now has a chance of getting stunned when their attack is blocked by a [[shield]].
* Can now be ridden by [[vindicator]]s, [[pillager]]s, and [[evoker]]s.
* Added sounds and animation.
* Now has the ability to destroy certain blocks, and will avoid [[cactus]] and [[sweet berry bush]]es.
* No longer attacks baby villagers.
* Are no longer only available through Experimental Gameplay.
|-
| [[Pillager]]
| [[File:Pillager.png|128px]]
|
* No longer attack baby villagers.
* Now drop [[Pillager#Drops|special loot]] if spawned from raids.
|-
| [[Vindicator]]
| [[File:Vindicator.png|128px]]
|
* No longer attack baby villagers.
* Now drop [[Vindicator#Drops|special loot]] if spawned from raids.
* Can now break down doors during raids.
|-
| [[Evoker]] and [[vex]]
| {{animate|Evoker.png;Vex BE.png|128px}}
| No longer attack baby villagers.
|-
| [[Villager]]
| {{animate|Plains Villager Base.png;Desert Villager Base.png;Jungle Villager Base.png;Savanna Villager Base.png;Snowy Villager Base.png;Swamp Villager Base.png;Taiga Villager Base.png|128px}}
| 
* Old villagers in existing worlds will now convert to new villagers.
* Removed old villager [[spawn egg]].
* New villagers are no longer only available through [[Experimental Gameplay]].
* Now restore health by sleeping in beds.
* No longer teleport through or get stuck in walls when trying to sleep.
* Farmers now choose [[composter]]s instead of [[farmland]] as their job site blocks.
* Farmers and Librarians now properly go to work.
* Improved pathfinding.
* Now hide in houses during raids.
* Some other fixes and optimizations.
|-
| [[Iron golem]]
| [[File:Iron Golem.png|128px]]
|
* Now properly spawn in [[pillager outpost]] cages.
* An iron golem now spawns in each [[village]].
* Improved pathfinding.
|}
